name: Fireworks, Saori Style Woven Shawl with Handspun Art yarn- Textile Couture, FiberArt to Wear
description:
I love this shawl so much! It's one of my most favorite pieces!!

The shawl measures at 17" wide and 6 ft 6" with fringe-
6 ft 6" without fringe. 

The warp is HABU stainless steel/silk yarn- it's very thin, but very strong. It perfectly holds the art yarn.  

The weft is 5 different handspun art yarns, utilizing 3 different spinning techiniques- chain ply, singles and corespun.  All the yarns have a black alpaca base with pops of rainbow bits and bobs of color and lots of sparkle.  I wove very lightly, so there's lots of space within the weft. As I wove, I added tufts of sari silk waste, tangles of sari silk threads and banana silk threads, and lengths of batik cotton and sari silk ribbon.

For more photos see my flickr site-
http://www.flickr.com/photos/jazzturtle/

This shawl is very soft and has amazing drape. It will certainly be the statement piece of your season. It will look amazing with a gray or black coat, or wrapped around your shoulders with a tshirt and jeans.

***************************
I try to accurately describe the colors and texture of the yarn, but please be aware that computer monitors vary in color display.

Hand Wash Only / Lay flat to dry
Smoke Free, kitty friendly home

If this is a gift, and it's going to an address OTHER than what's provided by paypal, please include the address you'd like me to use, along with a note to the recipient. Item will arrive wrapped in pretty tissue paper with your note attached on a postcard.

Shipped PRIORITY Mail PLUS insurance!! $15 If you'd like this to be shipped first class send me a convo and I'll send you a revised invoice. I CANNOT be responsible if you don't purchase insurance and the package gets lost or damaged in the mail. Any overage paid will be refunded after label is printed.

I will ship this internationally, but there is no tracking or insurance on international packages. International buyers accept the risks of shipping without insurance.

name: Autumn Equinox; Handspun Art Yarn Fall Wreath, Textile Couture for your Festivities
description:
The leaves changing and a crisp bite in the air.. Fall has arrived.

I used a 12" grapevine wreath. I lovingly wrapped silk and handspun art yarn around the wreath. I added some beautiful silk flowers and butterflies that sparkle for a bit of holiday shine.

This is an amazing piece that you will enjoy using year after year!!

You can hang this wreath on your door with a 'wreath hook' that you can buy at any craft or home improvement store. This wreath is also a great size to go on your mantle or an inside door.

***************************
I try to accurately describe the colors and texture of fiber and yarn, but please be aware that computer monitors vary in color display. If you have any questions feel free to convo me!! I do not accept returns due to monitor variance.

Hand Wash Only Lay Flat to Dry
Smoke Free, Kitty Friendly Home

Shipping is combined for multiple purchases. I do ship worldwide.

For detailed shipping info and other FAQ's, see my store policies

name: Black Magic Woven Shawl with Handspun Art yarn- Textile Couture, FiberArt to Wear
description:
This is an incredible shawl!! It's really amazing!! I wove it on my Ashford loom, from yarn I corespun myself.

The shawl measures at 17" wide and 7 ft 6" with fringe-
6 ft 6" without fringe. The warp is a soft silk/bamboo yarn, in black. The weft is handspun corespun yarn that I spun from some soft and sparkly roving in shades of black and turquoise. The fibers include alpaca, silk, bamboo, merino and loads of sparkle, I spun 2 different yarns.. one smoother and super sparkly, and one that has a shiny turquoise lurex wrap. I then wove sections of the yarn in random lengths for a wonderful subtle striping effect.

This shawl is very soft and has amazing drape. It will certainly be the statement piece of your season. It will look amazing with a gray or black coat, or wrapped around your shoulders with a tshirt and jeans.

***************************
I try to accurately describe the colors and texture of the yarn, but please be aware that computer monitors vary in color display.

Hand Wash Only / Lay flat to dry
Smoke Free, kitty friendly home

If this is a gift, and it's going to an address OTHER than what's provided by paypal, please include the address you'd like me to use, along with a note to the recipient. Item will arrive wrapped in pretty tissue paper with your note attached on a postcard.

Shipped within the US, PRIORITY Mail PLUS insurance!! $15 If you'd like this to be shipped first class send me a convo and I'll send you a revised invoice. I CANNOT be responsible if you don't purchase insurance and the package gets lost or damaged in the mail. Any overage paid will be refunded after label is printed.
